component.name: TCPU
component.version: CMO内部使用，商用发布不用关注，设备不会显示

features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新新增时间地点水印和荣耀影像相框，新增孩子模式下通讯类三方应用内容管控，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
新增时间地点水印和荣耀影像相框，体验路径：“相机->设置->水印”。
新增孩子模式下通讯类三方应用内容管控。
合入安卓2024年8月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/8
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, this recommended update introduces time and location watermarks, as well as HONOR Frame. It also allows parents to control the content of third-party communication apps in Child mode. Additionally, a security patch is incorporated.
Camera now features time and location watermarks, as well as HONOR Frame. Try them out by going to: Camera > Settings > Watermark.
Parents can control the content of third-party communication apps in Child mode.

Android security patch (Aug 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/8

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
